Imports

api

Types

JwsClaims = JsonNode
JwsHeader = object
  alg*: string
  kid*: string
  typ*: string = "JWT"
JwsOptions = object
  iat*: bool = true          ## set iat (issued-at) automatically
  expIn*: int64 = 0          ## seconds until expiry; 0 = no exp
  nbfAt*: Time               ## optional not-before
  leeway*: int64 = 0         ## verify leeway on time claims

Procs

proc resolveKey(set: JwkSet; header: JwsHeader): tuple[alg: Alg, key: JwkItem] {.
    ...raises: [JwkError], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Resolve JWK item and algorithm from set+header 
proc sign(set: JwkSet; header: JwsHeader; claims: JwsClaims;
          opt: JwsOptions = JwsOptions()): string {.
    ...raises: [JwkError, JwtError], tags: [TimeEffect], forbids: [].}
Sign: headers + claims -> compact JWT 
proc verify(set: JwkSet; header: JwsHeader; token: string;
            opt: JwsOptions = JwsOptions()): JsonNode {....raises: [JwkError,
    JwtError, ValueError, IOError, OSError, JsonParsingError],
    tags: [ReadIOEffect, WriteIOEffect], forbids: [].}
Verify: compact JWT -> payload JSON; throws on failure
